name: Virtual Assistant
preprompt: write a script in C# for Unity, so a class that inherits from MonoBehaviour. Need Only a start function that implements the code, and an update where in the update you immediately destroy the component. In your answer always write code between tag ```csharp and tag ```
prompt_suffix: In start you put the creation of the primitive or primitives to generate the model. You need then to call also the function ObjectsTable.AddGameObject(id, gameobject) in start function where id is a uniuqe string that need to be different from the ids and you call ObjectsTable.GetAllIDs() that returns a List<string> to be user you do not clash with IDs, and gameobject is the create primitive. Put also 'using System.Collections.Generic' at the beginning of the script
evaluation_prompt: Is the object in the image classified as this object?
evaluation_prompt_suffix: respond with a value, considering that it needs to be classified correctly with a score between 0 to 100. It is good if it is over 80. If it is lower than 80, create a description for helping to improve it.
